Event.FestivalOfTheLost.Description:
Laugh in the face of death, collect candies, wear masks, and fight back against the encroaching darkness.

Eva Levante has returned as the herald of the Festival of the Lost. This holiday is a time for Guardians to indulge their sweet tooth, don irreverent masks, and celebrate the memories of those we have lost.

The Haunted Forest is open once again, and this time, The Spider wants to bargain for your cooperation.
Event.FestivalOfTheLost.Name: 英灵日
Event.IronBanner.Description: A special week-long Crucible event that challenges teams of 6 to go head-to-head in the most competitive form of Control. Light level advantages enabled.
Event.SolsticeOfHeroes.Description:
The annual tradition to honor the sacrifices of Guardians everywhere has come again. Eva has returned to the Tower and awaits you near the Statue of Heroes. Gather and celebrate the resilience of humanity’s foremost defenders.

Complete all objectives on all items in a set to unlock the next set. Complete objectives on Magnificent gear to unlock its glow, and access to others.
Event.SolsticeOfHeroes.Description.Exten:
The annual tradition to honor the sacrifices of Guardians everywhere has come again. Eva has returned to the Tower and awaits you near the Statue of Heroes. Gather and celebrate the resilience of humanity’s foremost defenders.

Fly the friendly skies of the European Aerial Zone (EAZ) and take on the Hive, Cabal, and Fallen. Once you’ve dispatched your foes in this three-player matchmade activity, set out across the EAZ in search of treasure chests. The more bosses you defeat, the more rewards you’ll earn.
Event.SolsticeOfHeroes.Name: 至日英雄 2020
FAQ.API.StatDiscrepancy.Description:
There are multiple sources for stats in Destiny. Clan Historical Stats is based on the HistoricalStats API endpoint while others source their data from PGCRs. It's hard to determine which holds the most accurate truth.

To display stats in the manner seen on Clan Historical Stats would require downloading terabytes of data from Bungie servers and significant compute power. This said, they're accurate enough for some friendly competition.
FAQ.API.StatDiscrepancy.Name: 公会历史统计并不一定与其他统计保持一致
Commonly asked, "What is the funny percentage to the right of collectibles and records?"

It's a percentage of players who've either discovered or redeemed the item. Every few days, _VOLUSPA_ collects data from users of _Braytech_ and takes note of who's got what.

It's been a hot topic as to whether it's accurate or useful and the truth is that all statistics are useless and dumb _unless_ you've included every single piece of data possible.

It's fair to assume that these stats are bias towards casual players (percentages may appear higher rather than lower due to the skill and attention of the users that are monitored).
展示可收集物和记录的详细数据
FAQ.Braytech.ServiceWorkerUpdate.Descrip:
From the _Settings_ view, you can try a variety of things. Start with _Update service worker_. Wait a small time and you should be prompted to reload.

If this fails, you can try refreshing the app by selecting _Reload_. If the problem continues to persist please select _Dump service worker_.

_For the technically inclined, Braytech uses a service worker and sometimes they're fussy._
FAQ.Braytech.ServiceWorkerUpdate.Name: Braytech won't update to the newest version
In orbit, planning something terribly he: 在轨道上，计划着某些不为人知的事情。
Landing.About.What:
Braytech is an app and it wants to be your best Destiny sidekick.

Braytech's features include _Clan_, _Collections_, _Triumphs_, _Trackers_, _Checklists_, _Maps_, _Quests_, _Reports_, as well as curated and customisable views.

Just as Destiny is a game for all Guardians, available in various languages, so is Braytech. It's beautiful on both desktop computers and smaller touch devices, accessible by anyone from anywhere.

The name, Braytech, is that which Clovis Bray, one of several of the franchise's fictional entities, designates their consumer products line; weapons, armour, etc. As such, I thought it fitting as a name for what I endeavour to be one of Destiny's best third-party resources.
Landing.About.Who:
Hi, my name's Tom, and I'm addicted to Destiny. Okay, so not addicted—I've had time to build this web app. Truthfully, I'm an avid Destiny enthusiast who needs both an outlet for letting off steam and for developing my web skills further for use in my professional activities.

Braytech is a stringent exercise in mimicry—and to a small degree, reimagining—Destiny's UI for web and mobile. This has been my first React project, the first time I've heavily used the command line, the first time I've had to use NPM... And it's been super fun and rewarding, most of the time!
Landing.Blog.Error: Blog posts couldn't be loaded at this time.
Landing.Header.Flair: Welcome. This is Braytech—a fan-built companion app for Bungie's Destiny. Unleash your potential and make Shaxx proud.
Landing.Support:
Building these beautiful interfaces and fencing with Bungie's APIs takes effort and time. I can only devote so much of it to hobby ventures, which also cost money to keep online. I have a firm stance against ads on web sites as we know them. As such, I prefer to support these projects out of my own pocket and depend on the generosity of my community.

By supporting me, you can help ensure that I can keep these projects online, as well as help enable me to continue adding cool new features.
Landing.VOLUSPA: For the most part, Braytech is a simple front-end application. Although, beneath lies VOLUSPA, named after of one of _Rasputin's_ subminds. VOLUSPA records user profiles' unique identifier and regularly collates statistics based upon them. These statistics are displayed throughout the app in the form of record and collectible _commonality_—the term I've given the statistics that denotes how common a collectible or record is between players.

Search.Suggestions:
Search supports filters as prefixes. Try `name:mida` to only match entities whereby their name value includes the term "mida."

Supported prefixes:
- name
- description
- source

You may also search by manifest `hash`.

Results will be prioritised by name, source, and description.

UserModules.Customise.Ranks.Name: 🦘 Ranks
UserModules.Customise.Reckoning.Descript: 🦘 Venture into the mysterious Haul that the Drifter tows behind his ship to reckon with greater powers.
UserModules.Customise.Reckoning.Name: 大清算
UserModules.Customise.SeasonArtifact.Des: 显示您的赛季通行证状态与进度。
UserModules.Customise.SeasonCountdown.De: 下个赛季还有多久到来。
UserModules.Customise.SeasonPass.Descrip: 显示你的赛季通行证进度与奖励。
UserModules.Customise.SeasonPass.Name: 赛季通行证
UserModules.Customise.TrialsOfOsiris.Des: 🦘 Compete in a fireteam-required event version of Elimination. Earn as many wins on a ticket as you can. Three losses and you're out.
UserModules.Customise.Vendor.Name: 商人
UserModules.Customise.VendorSpiderMateri: 追踪蛛王的材料交易信息。
UserModules.Customise.WeeklyBounties.Des: 从你最爱的商人取得的周常悬赏。
UserModules.Customise.WeeklyVanguardSing: 该元素焦灼适用于本周的多数活动。
UserModules.CustomiseTip.Description: 你知道吗？ 你可以通过点击右下角的 _自定义_ 来自定义显示的模块。
UserModules.DailyHeroicStoryMissions.Des: 重温曾经的挑战与故事。调整自己的状态，去挑战自己做到更好。
UserModules.DailyVanguardModifiers.Name: 先锋行动
UserModules.DailyVanguardModifiers.Unava: Vanguard Strikes are unavailable for this character.
UserModules.DreamingCityCurseCycle.Descr:
幽梦之城正处于第 {{week}} 阶段诅咒.

_Savathûn's Curse: implemented with Riven's dying breath and reset with every death of Dûl Incaru._
一位典型的邪魔族骑士，鲍克利特具有高防御和高攻击力，充满挑战。
UserModules.EscalationProtocol.Damkath.D: 一个典型的邪魔族虫瘤，但姆卡特的弱点是他背上那如牛一般大的脉动囊肿。
UserModules.EscalationProtocol.Info: Braytech 无法确定零号世界线催化剂的具体进度, 但展示了 Boss 掉落以便自行确认。
UserModules.EscalationProtocol.Kathok.De: 一位邪魔族骑士，卡梭克将不断召唤怨魂轰炸玩家。他的无敌护盾可以被堕落骑士掉落的剑击破。
UserModules.EscalationProtocol.Naksud.De: 一个高防御虫瘤，纳克赛德任何时候都能被攻击，但是他会召唤自爆怨魂冲向他自爆并治疗他。
一个典型的邪魔族虫瘤，努尔阿巴斯被无敌护盾所保护，消灭他周围的小怪以摧毁护盾。
努尔阿巴斯，尸飕的头冠
UserModules.Menagerie.Arunak.Name: 卡鲁斯至爱的勇士阿鲁纳
UserModules.Menagerie.Hasapiko.Name: 卡鲁斯宠信的勇士哈萨匹克
UserModules.Menagerie.Pagouri.Name: 卡鲁斯宠信的勇士帕格里
UserModules.Nightfalls.NoCollectibles: 这个日落没有任何相关的收藏品
UserModules.Nightfalls.NoRecords: 这个日落没有任何相关记录
UserModules.NightmareHunts.Description:
Your most feared, devastating, tormenting nightmares reincarnate―be immovable in your resolve, Guardian.

_Hunt down this week's available nightmares for... satisfaction._
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ALinkToTheC: 召唤崇圣首脑阶段，全部玩家必须同时刷新启蒙 Buff，允许队伍分散并在不同继电器上完成刷新。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.AllForOneOn: 保险库关：每个守护者必须获取并放置一次 Buff （Boss 必须在3次输出阶段以内击杀）。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ColiseumCha: 秋露·知追逐关：守护者们不能受到秋露·知的电能爆发的伤害。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ForeverFigh: 莫格斯关：不击杀小虫瘤，只杀莫格斯。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.Gauntlet.De: 守护者不能在同一个台子上站超过一次。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.HoldTheLine: 市区遭遇战：地图生成器不得低于一半电量。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.KeepOut: 保险库关：骑士必须在刷新的房间内被击杀。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.LimitedBles: 仪式关：在虫群仪式进行时同时不能有超过两名守护者拥有女巫祝福。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.PleasureGar: 每个棱镜持有者每个阶段只能射击一个植物。
整个阶段必须有一位守护者不能离开中央区域的水。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.StayingAliv: 完成避开崇圣首脑阶段并且不击杀 boss 所在区域新刷新出的独眼巨人。其他区域，包括最后冲刺阶段的独眼巨人则可以击杀。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.StrengthOfM: 瑞文关：守护者们不能射击同一只眼两次。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.SummoningRi: 卡莉关：净化全部九个台子，击杀所有九个骑士，并在输出卡丽之前击杀所有虫瘤。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.Throne.Desc: 每次输出阶段同时使用4个台子。在所有台子激活前不要开火。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.Throne.Name: 王座
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ToEachTheir: 暴动首领关：每个守护者每个阶段不能射击并破坏超过一个护盾生成器。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ToTheTop: 击杀崇圣首脑阶段每次都必须存入 10 个荧光。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.TotalVictor: 分身关：在击败分身的阶段内五次击破分身的护盾，比如单阶段通关。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.WithBothHan: 加尔兰关：每个守护者只能在真身举起他的手时射击真身的手一次。
UserModules.Raids.Challenges.ZeroToOneHu: 击杀圣洁首脑阶段，每个继电器都必须存满 30 个荧光。对于每个继电器，必须在 10 秒内存满
UserModules.Reckoning.Description: 浪客的智谋比预期更加深不可测，在浪客的神秘曳室中消灭傀儡古昧，赢得玖之青睐。
UserModules.SeasonArtifact.Progression.D: 获得经验值可以得到能量点数和解锁强大的模组，这些模组可以被插入到武器和盔甲中。
UserModules.TrialsOfOsiris.Info: 与圣-14交谈开始你的试炼。
UserModules.WeeklyVanguardSinge.Descript: 该元素焦灼适用于本周的多数活动。这些活动包括 {{activities}}。
UserModules.WeeklyVanguardSinge.StrikesU: 该角色无法进行先锋打击
